param.name: description
param.value: PacBio de novo assembler optimized for quality.

module.label: PreAssembler Filter v1
module.description: Filter reads for use in the pre-assembly step of HGAP, the hierarchical genome assembly process.

param.name: minSubReadLength
param.label: Minimum Subread Length
param.title: Subreads shorter than this value (in base pairs) are filtered out and excluded from analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

param.name: readScore
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Quality
param.title: Polymerase reads with lower quality than this value are filtered out and excluded from analysis.

param.name: minLength
param.label: Minimum Polymerase Read Length
param.title: Polymerase reads shorter than this value (in base pairs) are filtered out and excluded from analysis.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer

module.label: PreAssembler v2
module.title: Using DAG-based consensus algorithm, pre-assemble long reads as the first step of the Hierarchical Genome Assembly process (HGAP). Version 2 is a stepping stone for scaling to much larger genomes.

param.name: computeLengthCutoff
param.label: Compute Minimum Seed Read Length
param.title: Specify whether or not to compute the minimum seed read length that results in at least 30X target genome coverage, by the longest subreads. This is based on the genome size you specified.

param.name: minLongReadLength
param.label: Minimum Seed Read Length
param.title: The minimum length of reads (in base pairs) to use as seeds for pre-assembly.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 1 and 100000

param.name: targetChunks
param.label: Number of Seed Read Chunks
param.title: The number of pieces to split the data files into while running PreAssembler.

param.name: splitBestn
param.label: Alignment Candidates Per Chunk
param.title: The number of alignments to consider for each read for a particular chunk.

param.name: totalBestn
param.title: The number of potential alignments BLASR should consider across all chunks for a particular read.

param.name: blasrOpts
param.label: BLASR Options (Advanced)
param.title: -bestn and -nCandidates values should be roughly equal to the expected seed read coverage.

module.label: CeleraAssembler v1
module.description: This module wraps the Celera Assembler v7.0

param.name: genomeSize
param.label: Genome Size (bp)
param.title: The approximate genome size, in base pairs.

rule.message: Must be a value between 1 and 150000000

param.name: asmWatchTime
param.title: Seconds to wait for runCA outputs to be copied into job dir.

param.name: xCoverage
param.label: Target Coverage
param.title: Fold coverage to target for when picking the minimum fragment length for assembly; typically 15 to 25.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 10 and 30, inclusive

param.name: ovlErrorRate
param.label: Overlapper error rate
param.title: Trimming and assembly overlaps above this error limit won't be detected.

param.name: ovlMinLen
param.label: Overlapper min length
param.title: Overlaps shorter than this length (in base pairs) are not computed.

param.name: merSize
param.label: Overlapper k-mer
param.title: The length of the seeds (in base pairs) used by the seed-and-extend algorithm.

param.name: specInRunCA
param.label: Pre-defined spec file
param.title: The path to an existing specification file used to run the assembly program.

module.label: BLASR v1
module.description: BLASR maps reads to genomes by finding the highest scoring local alignment or set of local alignments between the read and the genome. The first set of alignments is found by querying an index of the reference genome, and then refining until only high scoring alignments are retained. Additional pulse metrics are loaded into the resulting cmp.h5 file to enable downstream use of the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: maxHits
param.label: Maximum number of hits per read
param.title: The maximum number of matches of each read to the reference sequence that will be evaluated. maxHits should be greater than the expected number of repeats if you want to spread hits out on the genome.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 1000

param.name: maxDivergence
param.label: Maximum divergence (%)
param.title: The maximum allowed divergence (in %) of a read from the reference sequence.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 100

param.name: minAnchorSize
param.label: Minimum anchor size
param.title: The minimum size of the read (in base pairs) that must match against the reference.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 8 and 30

param.name: samBam
param.label: Write output as a BAM file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a BAM representation of the cmp.h5 file.

param.name: gff2Bed
param.label: Write BED coverage file
param.title: Specify whether or not to output a BED representation of the depth of coverage summary.

param.name: placeRepeatsRandomly
param.label: Place repeats randomly
param.title: Specify that if BLASR maps a read to more than one location with equal probability, then it randomly selects which location it chooses as the best location. If not set, defaults to the first on the list of matches.

param.name: loadPulsesOpts
param.title: The default option of loadPulses is 'byread'. Option 'bymetric' is desined to sacrifice memory for increased speed, especially for jobs of which the number of reference contigs is large.

module.label: AssemblyPolishing v1 (Quiver)
module.description: Polish a pure-PacBio assembly for maximum accuracy using the Quiver algorithm.

param.name: enableMapQVFilter
param.label: Use only unambiguously mapped reads
param.title: Specify whether or not to filter out reads where Map QV is less than 10. Reduces coverage in repeat regions that are shorter than the read length.
